Parameters.Name: MEDIA-2-3-15 VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)

Test.ONVIFTestID: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check Video Encoder Configuration use count when removing Video Encoder Configuration from profile

Test.ONVIFTestID: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Incorrect response (wrong UseCount)
Test.Description: Check Video Encoder Configuration use count when removing VideoEncoderConfiguration from profile when UseCount value is not decreased by 1 after removing VideoEncoderConfiguration from profile

Test.ONVIFTestID: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct fault (not fixed Profile exists)
Test.Description: Check Video Encoder Configuration use count when removing Video Encoder Configuration from profile when DUT returns Action/MaxNVTProfiles on CreateProfile and not fixed Profile exists

Test.ONVIFTestID: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct fault (all Profiles are fixed)
Test.Description: Check Video Encoder Configuration use count when removing Video Encoder Configuration from profile when DUT returns Action/MaxNVTProfiles on CreateProfile and all Profiles are fixed

Test.ONVIFTestID: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Incorrect response (no compatible VECs)

Test.ONVIFTestID: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (REMOVE VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct response (find compatible VEC with 2nd attempt)
